abstract: Misled by "an illusion of plenty" in spawning areas favored by recreational fishermen, managers and fishermen failed to notice a steep decline in stocks of barred sand bass and kelp bass in Southern California, researchers say.
snippet: Misled by "an illusion of plenty" in spawning areas favored by recreational fishermen, managers and fishermen failed to notice a steep decline in stocks of barred sand bass and kelp bass in Southern California, researchers say.
